amendment.description: Amendment adds language which encourages the Assistant Administrator to utilize Land Grant Institutions, Historically Black Colleges and Universities, Hispanic Serving Institutions and other minority serving institutions among other resources to undertake research for programs covered by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include language which encourages the Assistant Administrator to utilize Land Grant Institutions, Historically Black Colleges and Universities, Hispanic Serving Institutions and other minority serving institutions among other resources to undertake research for programs covered by the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 0 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 82).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
